categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The bombing of Mennar-Daye was carried out by the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing on Mennar-Daye prior to the Battle of Endor. Whilst flying over Pandem Nai during the attack on Pandem Nai, the mind of Lieutenant Yrica Quell flashed to the bombardment of Mennar-Daye, which she had dutifully joined.
